schema.name: custom_catalog_reporting
schema.comment: new drpt_products compiles information about each product in the catalog new

view-db.view-body: select p.product_id as product_id, 'N/A' as category_name, avg(s.wholesale_price) as avg_cost, avg(s.list_price) as avg_list_price, avg(s.sale_price) as avg_sale_price, ((avg(s.list_price) - avg(s.wholesale_price)) / avg(s.wholesale_price)) as avg_initial_markup, sum(inv.stock_level) as units_on_hand, count(s.sku_id) as number_of_skus from dcs_product p, dcs_sku s, dcs_prd_chldsku pc, dcs_inventory inv where p.product_id = pc.product_id and pc.sku_id = s.sku_id and pc.sku_id = inv.catalog_ref_id group by p.product_id
